thread.title: Kichcha Sudeep's Hebbuli gets U/A certificate : Regional cinema, News - India Today
thread.title_full: Kichcha Sudeep's Hebbuli gets U/A certificate : Regional cinema, News - India Today

title: Kichcha Sudeep's Hebbuli gets U/A certificate : Regional cinema, News - India Today
text:
Kichcha Sudeep's Hebbuli gets U/A certificate Kannada superstar Kichcha Sudeep's upcoming thriller Hebbuli has passed the censor formalities with a U/A certificate. IndiaToday.in | Written by Srivatsan Hebbuli poster 
Kichcha Sudeep received international acclaim for his condescending performance in SS Rajamouli's Eega/Makkhi. 
Last seen in the hit film Mukunda Murari alongside superstar Upendra. Sudeep is gearing up for the grand release of his upcoming Kannada action thriller Hebbuli. 
While the film will have a worldwide release on the auspicious day of Maha Sivaratri, Hebbuli has cleared the censor formalities and passed with a U/A certificate without any cuts, according to The News Minute. 
Directed by Krishna of Gajakesari, Hebbuli is touted to be based on Indian army's surgical strikes last year. 
Made on a lavish budget, the film is releasing across the state in over 300 screens. Apart from Kichha, Hebbuli stars Amala Paul, V Ravichandran, Kabir Duhan Singh and P Ravi Shankar in important roles. With a strong pre-buzz favouring the film, the makers expect at least Rs 20 crore on its opening day. 
Hebbuli has music by Arjun Janya, while A Karunakar will crank the camera.
